data.name: Adopting a People-First Mindset: The Crisis Algorithm for Leaders
data.summary:
Topics Covered:
1. Tackling the 'climate of fear' with transparent communication & continuous engagement
2. Providing direction, alignment, and confidence within the organization
3. Investing in employee development through digital up-skilling
4. Offering employee assistance programme to keep employee well-being in check
